definition: to sing loudly/to lift one's voice in song
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
song/CL:支[zhi1],首[shou3]/to sing
variant of 歌[ge1]
to advance singing loudly (idiom); triumphant progress
to sing at the top of one's voice (idiom)

sentences.english: Pundits are singing choruses about the danger of risk.
sentences.chinese: 评论员们在高歌风险中的危险。

sentences.english: Singing in front of speech movements, Tsai Yu-Shuang behind Sound.
sentences.chinese: 高歌在前面演动作，蔡雨爽在后面伴音。

sentences.english: Mothers-in-law improve the rising housing price.
sentences.chinese: 丈母娘鞭促房价高歌猛进。

sentences.english: When Tom was on his way home, he was in such a good mood that he felt like singing.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆在回家的路上，心情好到想高歌一曲。

sentences.english: Because if sings loudly lastingly sings fiercely, speaks excessively many.
sentences.chinese: 如因持久高歌猛唱，讲话过多。

sentences.english: Hearing from this, Lixiaoxia has been anoia from grief. Songdanping will sing when it comes to evening, and Xiaoxia is comforted with the songs.
sentences.chinese: 每到夜晚，宋丹萍昂首高歌，晓霞在歌声中得到安慰。

sentences.english: We had a good time and trolled all the way.
sentences.chinese: 我们玩得很高兴，一路上放声高歌。

sentences.english: Everyone in the restaurant crowded around them and started singing.
sentences.chinese: 餐厅里的所有人都挤在他们周围，开始放声高歌。

sentences.english: Sing as if nobody is hearing you.
sentences.chinese: 放声的高歌，就像没人在倾听一样。

sentences.english: Rejoice always, sing song to Lord, no matter what situation is.
sentences.chinese: 常常喜乐，向主高歌，不论环境如何。

sentences.english: From the blind, I see Donald on his singing perch.
sentences.chinese: 透过百叶窗，我看到唐纳德在枝头引吭高歌。

sentences.english: She walked out onto the apron and began to sing in front of the full theatre.
sentences.chinese: 她走上台口，开始对着整个剧场放声高歌。

sentences.english: Does it not also sing with the waves that fall?
sentences.chinese: 难道它没有伴着落潮高歌？

sentences.english: Sing as if nobody is hearing yoou.
sentences.chinese: 放声地高歌，就像没人在倾听一样。

sentences.english: Jara sang, his song a weapon in the hands of love.
sentences.chinese: 哈拉引吭高歌，是战斗的利器，紧握在爱之手。

definition: to sing loudly/fig. to mouth slogans
to sing at the top of one's voice (idiom)
to sing and dance/general term for a round dance
to sing/to recite
lit. sing to accompany wine (idiom); fig. life is short, make merry while you can
to recite poetry
bold/open-minded/heroic
singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
to drink excessively
to toast sb (with wine etc)/to drink a toast
to pour wine
impassioned/worked up
(literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
sad melody/stirring strains/elegy/dirge/threnody/sing with solemn fervor
to sing/to call loudly/to chant
